PSCT.Vegas:
① If a "Bujin" monster in your GY or your face-up-field is banished (except during the Damage Step): 
You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. 
② Once per turn, during the End Phase, if a "Bujin" card was added from your Deck to your hand this turn (except by drawing it) while you controlled this face-up card: 
You can draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. 
③ You can only control 1 "Bujin Arasuda".
PSCT.Meadowlands:

PSCT.Base: If a "Bujin" monster in your Graveyard or face-up on your side of the field is banished (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand in face-up Defense Position. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if a "Bujin" card was added from your Deck to your hand this turn, except by drawing it, while you controlled this face-up card: You can draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. You can only control 1 "Bujin Arasuda".
